title: How to be a good science teacher - Quora

response.answer_text: I believe these are the qualities to be a successful teacher of any subject: Excellent subject knowledge – including retaining credibility by keeping up-to-date with current practices and changes in knowledge – this is particularly important in a field such as science.An ability to effectively use a range of learning/teaching methods and learning materials.An talent for developing positive social interactions on several levels i.e.Teacher – student relationshipsRelationships with other teachersRelationships within other educational circlesAn awareness and desire to meet the needs of individual student differences.A wider knowledge of those factors impacting on the education system and educational practices.An interest in working on subject related, and education, projects to plan and prepare for shaping the future.

As a science teacher that teachers should know their subject matter and also other qualities of a good science teacher include being passionate about teaching effective, curriculum and standards-based science lessons, showing up for work early and helping their school excel. These are the qualities of a science teacher: Teacher should be trained in modern methods and techniques.expert communication skillsdeep knowledge and passion for their subject matterthe ability to build caring relationships with studentsfriendliness and approachabilityexcellent preparation and organization skillscommunity-building skills.These are the qualities that a science tutor should have.
